entry.title: $2000 // Well Furnished Premium 1Bedroom/1Bathroom Apartment
entry.content:
The C line is the most coveted one bedroom apartment line in Chelsea Gardens. Where else can you have, light , quiet, a windowed Kitchen with a separate dining area, a large entrance foyer, garden views and a reasonable mtc. in a prewar doorman building in a hot Chelsea location?
No where but here.
This home is extra ordinary because it has been carefully designed to enhance all the deco details that make this building so appealing, including gold plated door hardware and hinges by PE Guerin throughout, integrated remotely controlled AV system, additional electric capacity and custom paint finishes. The foyer is elegant and large with 2 spacious closets, and Nulux wall washing ceiling fixtures. The Kitchen, with a large garden view window, has Luce di Luna quartzite counters, Sub Zero Frig, Bosch D/W and a GE dual fuel range, beautiful custom cabinetry with PE Guerin hardware and a large eating area. The bedroom has 2 exposures onto the buildings common garden that allows you to wake up to birds, swaying leaves and fresh seasonal plantings. The entire apartment is bathed in Southern and Western light and is pin drop quiet day and night. The sunken Living room and original plaster details. A vintage style windowed bathroom with nickle plated fixtures and classic custom subway tiles and a gesso painted ceiling and marble tub enclosure that add to the over all elegance and sophistication of this perfect, spacious one bedroom home that rarely becomes available in this unique building.

entry.title: $2250 // Take advantage of this BEAUTIFULLY FURNISHED 1 BEDROOM
entry.content:
Take advantage of this BEAUTIFULLY FURNISHED large gut renovated 1 BEDROOM apartment W/15ft ceilings in Chelsea.
This apartment features tons of natural light, 3 front facing Over-sized Windows, new appliances, bamboo floors, beautiful spacious bathroom, very high ceilings, amazing views of the Empire State Building and a laundry room in the building .
A must see if you are are looking for a FURNISHED apartment in Chelsea with great views.
Short and long-term rental.
International in student renters welcomed.
